title: Budget & Work Performance Dashboard
short_summary: Automated personal finance and work performance dashboard with KPI tracking
summary: A dashboard-centric analytics project designed to track income, expenses, and work performance KPIs in a single interactive view. Built primarily in Google Sheets with automation support, the dashboard converts raw pay and performance data into actionable insights such as effective hourly rate, add-on performance, time per stop, and weekly scorecards.

components.name: Interactive Google Sheets Dashboard
components.objective: Provide a real-time, interactive view of financial and work performance KPIs
components.business_value: Improves visibility into income trends, productivity, and efficiency while reducing manual tracking effort

components.name: Google Apps Script Automation
components.objective: Automate data ingestion, normalization, and KPI refreshes
components.business_value: Eliminates manual updates and ensures consistent, reliable performance tracking
